properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 9 at 2:22PM PST until February 10 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

-GENERAL SEAS...Seas 10 to 11 ft this evening, subsiding to 9 ft
later this evening. Seas 7 to 8 ft on Monday.

-FIRST EBB...Very strong ebb around 5 pm today. Seas near 15 ft
with breakers.

-SECOND EBB...around 530 am Monday. Seas near 12 ft with
breakers possible.

-THIRD EBB...Very strong ebb around 545 pm Monday. Seas 10 ft
with breaker possible.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 PM this evening.
For the Small Craft Advisory, from 3 AM to 7 AM Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions could be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 7 AM MONDAY
